p: In the next step, 200 mg of SEABs were ground in a mortar and dispersed with isopropanol (10 mL) in a volumetric flask, and then stirred at 500 rpm for 1 h. The solution was then filtered through a 0.45-mm filter. The γ-oryzanol content was determined using UV-visible spectrophotometry at 327 nm [ 27]. The drug-entrapment efficiency was determined using the following formula: Encapsulation efficiency (%) = γ-oryzanol in low-gelation alginate/γ-oryzanol in SEAB × 100
